profile_summary: With 8 years of experience as a Full Stack Developer, I excel in delivering high-performance solutions utilizing **Angular**, **PHP**, **MySQL**, and **Symfony**. My strong foundation in **Agile** methodologies supports effective project management and team collaboration in remote settings. I am adept at creating data-driven applications that meet business goals, accounting for compliance needs and best practices. Beyond technical skills, I have a proven track record in product management, effective communication, team management, and coaching, ensuring that all team members contribute effectively to project success. My comprehensive background also includes full-stack development with **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter**, alongside experience with various frameworks like **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. I have extensive cloud experience with **Azure** and **AWS**, having led the development of enterprise-grade platforms that seamlessly integrate AI/ML capabilities for predictive analytics and real-time data processing. I am well-versed in microservices architecture, event-driven systems, and CI/CD automation, further enhancing the robustness and security of applications.
